title: ESET NOD32 Antivirus/Smart Security 8.0.319.1 Activated-AppzDam

ESET NOD32 8 ensures your computer a high level of anti-virus security. Simple and reliable choice for basic protection against viruses, worms, Trojans, spyware, adware and potentially dangerous software, rootkits and phishing attacks.
ESET Smart Security 8 will help make the web safe and secure as possible. Reliable detection of all types of threats and high scanning speed made Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹possible through a combination of new "cloud" technology and intellectual advanced heuristics ThreatSense.

Features :

Stay safe from online threats. With the unique technology of the product ESET NOD32 Antivirus 8 neutralizes all types of threats, such as viruses, rootkits, worms, and spyware. Using the cloud while scanning further increases the level of protection provides a high scanning speed and stable operation of your computer.
Anti-Virus and Anti-Spyware
It provides proactive protection against all types of online and offline threats and prevents the spread of malicious programs to other computers.
Scan to cloud-based
It increases the speed of the scan by creating a "white" lists based on file reputation database information.
Check when downloading files
It reduces the scanning of specific file types, such as files or large files already at boot time.
Management of removable media
It allows you to block connections CD, DVD, USB and other removable media drives.
It allows you to prevent unauthorized copying of confidential information to an external device.
Intrusion Prevention System (HIPS)
It controls the action of the operating system and reacts to them according to predefined rules.
Feel the speed advantage. ESET Smart Security 8 is adapted to your system and allows you to take full advantage of its capabilities. If your laptop is running on battery power only, all complex operations to be postponed, allowing work longer without recharging.
The minimal consumption of system resources
It supports high-productivity system.
The minimum size of the product update files does not load the connection to the Internet network.
Game Mode
Product ESET Smart Security 8 automatically switches to the background mode immediately after the start of the computer game, the opening of the program in full-screen mode or the start of the presentation.
All pop-up windows, updates and scheduled tasks are postponed, which ensures high productivity programs in full screen.
Laptop Support
It allows you to postpone all complex operations, allowing for longer work without the need for recharging.
"Install and forget" attitude, or every detail. The solution ESET Smart Security 8 provides quality protection immediately after installation without the need for additional intervention. Optionally, you can configure more than 150 product parameters to monitor every detail.
Access in one click
Protection status, as well as all the actions and tools that are often used, available to the user from all windows of the program.
In the event of security problems, you can quickly find a solution in a single click.
Extra options
Allows you to customize the program to suit the needs of the user.
Allows you to set the maximum depth of scanning latency test results, the size of files and archives, as well as other parameters.
Post-scan
Having made a scan "on demand", the program prompts you to select an action to perform, namely - go to sleep, restart, or shut down the computer.

Features of ESET Smart Security:

Find and return stolen laptop with the function of Anti-Theft
Automatic monitoring of lost devices.
It displays the position of the stolen computer map based on Wi-Fi networks in range of their actions.
It allows you to see the thieves using the camera.
Collection screenshots lost laptop.

Personal firewall - your connections are under control
Prevents unauthorized use of your personal data.
Cautions when connecting to unknown networks and offers to move to enhanced protection mode.
It makes your computer invisible to other devices connected to the same network.

Work and play without delay
Eliminating all types of threats, including viruses, rootkits, worms and spyware.
Acceleration test due to the "cloud" scanning.
Blocks CD, DVD, USB, and other media and storage devices.
Low impact on system performance.

Safer Internet for Children
Select one of the predefined categories, depending on the age of your children.
It allows you to select one of the preset profiles - a child, a teenager and a parent.
It allows you to set a password to protect settings from unauthorized changes and removal.
